alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 8:45AM MST until January 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally up to 15 inches in the upper Cottonwoods and the Mount Nebo area. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes including Big and Little Cottonwood Canyons, along with Logan Canyon, Sardine Canyon and Parley`s Canyon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
